thread.title: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson shuts down Perrie Edwards rift rumours - 'There will never be a feud!'
thread.title_full: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson shuts down Perrie Edwards rift rumours - 'There will never be a feud!'

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson shuts down Perrie Edwards rift rumours - 'There will never be a feud!'
text:
Jesy Nelson diffuses Little Mix spilt rumours Share this video Watch Next 
Fans tried to make sense of it in Instagram comments, with some fearing there had been a falling out and others assuring them that would never happen among the tight knit band. 
One wrote: “I know Perrie said that Jesy is cropped out because she doesn't like the pics but how come she's posted them on her account then? Just a question.” Perrie cut her pal out of this snap (Photo: Splash News) All the girls pose on the red carpet at the KCAs (Photo: WireImage) 
And on Thursday night the girls went clubbing after a show in Minnesota during their ongoing US tour with Ariana Grande - but Jesy didn't seem to be present. 
However, the singer has now shut down the speculation in a strongly worded Instagram post. 
"Was gonna leave it because people love to write s*** all the time and it's just something we have to get used to but it's gone to far now and it's really starting to get on my boobs," she fumed. Jesy says she just didn't like the picture (Photo: WireImage) 
Jesy then confirmed that she wasn't in the picture because she didn't like it. 
She continued: "There never has been and never will be a feud between my Perrie winkle and me! I didn't like the one poxy picture of myself so I asked Pez to crop me out and like a good friend she did and for some strange reason there has now been a story created that me and my Pez hate each other biggest load of bulls**t I've ever heard! 
"Anyway just wanted to clear that one up with everyone cs it's gotten a tad out of hand now xjesyx." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
